events.message: I am submitting a claim for the car accident that occurred on April 30th involving my vehicle and another on Main Street.
The submitted claim has been categorized under auto accident after reviewing the initial case description mentioning vehicle collision.
An agent with experience in auto accident claims has been assigned to your case for quicker resolution and support.
We have officially acknowledged receipt of your auto accident claim and will begin processing it shortly.
Please provide the police report and photos of the vehicle damage to proceed with your auto accident claim investigation.
You have submitted all required documents including the police report and pictures detailing the collision damage to your vehicle.
An investigation into the details and circumstances of your auto accident claim has officially commenced.
The investigation phase for your auto accident claim is now complete after reviewing all submitted evidence.
We have prepared a settlement proposal for the damages sustained in your car accident, reflecting our findings and coverage limits.
Thank you for your feedback on the proposed settlement offer. Your input helps us ensure your satisfaction with the claim process.
Your auto accident claim has been approved based on the investigation and your acceptance of the proposed settlement.
The settlement payment for your vehicle damages has been issued and should be received within 3-5 business days.
Your auto accident claim is now officially closed. Please reach out if you have any further questions or require assistance.
